column1: Traffic reports will resume Monday August 15 at 6:30 a.m.

column4: Inbound Harrodsburg Rd at Dogwood Trace Blvd
column5: All inbound lanes are shutdown until further notice due to investigation of a serious collision.  Traffic is being diverted to Overlake Blvd.

column4: Various streets on campus will be one-way.
Ave of Champions will be closed to thru traffic between Rose St and S Limestone.
Please see the move-in map for complete details.
